nodes.text: The Prototype Dx-2 Pyrodroid was the designation of a battle droid located on Corellia around 3640 BBY, when it was destroyed.

The Prototype Dx-2 Pyrodroid appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
